verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David יַֽעַנְךָ֣ <WH6030> ya-'an-Cha hear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom thee in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> tza-Rah; of trouble יְ֝שַׂגֶּבְךָ֗ <WH7682> ye-sag-gev-cha, defend שֵׁ֤ם׀ <WH8034> shem the name אֱלֹהֵ֬י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

יִשְׁלַֽח־ <WH7971> yish-lach- Send עֶזְרְךָ֥ <WH5828> 'ez-re-Cha thee help מִקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> mik-Ko-desh; from the sanctuary וּ֝מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> u-mitz-tzi-Yon, thee out of Zion יִסְעָדֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5582> yis-'a-De-ka. and strengthen

יִזְכֹּ֥ר <WH2142> yiz-Kor Remember כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִנְחֹתֶ֑ךָ <WH4503> min-cho-Te-cha; all thy offerings וְעוֹלָתְךָ֖ <WH5930> ve-'o-la-te-Cha thy burnt sacrifice יְדַשְּׁנֶ֣ה <WH1878> ye-dash-she-Neh and accept סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

יִֽתֶּן־ <WH5414> yit-ten- Grant לְךָ֥ le-Cha כִלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> chil-va-Ve-cha; thee according to thine own heart וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all עֲצָתְךָ֥ <WH6098> 'a-tza-te-Cha all thy counsel יְמַלֵּֽא׃ <WH4390> ye-mal-Le. and fulfil

נְרַנְּנָ֤ה׀ <WH7442> ne-ran-ne-Nah We will rejoice בִּ֘ישׁ֤וּעָתֶ֗ךָ <WH3444> bi-Shu-'a-Te-cha, in thy salvation וּבְשֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> u-ve-shem- and in the name אֱלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God נִדְגֹּ֑ל <WH1713> nid-Gol; we will set up [our] banners יְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> ye-mal-Le fulfil יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all מִשְׁאֲלוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4862> mish-'a-lo-Tei-cha. all thy petitions

עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, Now know כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for הוֹשִׁ֥יעַ׀ <WH3467> ho-Shi-a' saveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I that the LORD מְשִׁ֫יח֥וֹ <WH4899> me-Shi-Cho his anointed יַ֭עֲנֵהוּ <WH6030> Ya-'a-ne-hu he will hear מִשְּׁמֵ֣י <WH8064> mish-she-Mei heaven קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho; him from his holy בִּ֝גְבֻר֗וֹת <WH1369> big-vu-Rot, strength יֵ֣שַׁע <WH3468> Ye-sha' with the saving יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> ye-mi-No. of his right hand

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh Some בָ֭רֶכֶב <WH7393> Va-re-chev Some [trust] in chariots וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and some בַסּוּסִ֑ים <WH5483> vas-su-Sim; and some in horses וַאֲנַ֓חְנוּ׀ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> be-shem- the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu our God נַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> naz-Kir. but we will remember

הֵ֭מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah They כָּרְע֣וּ <WH3766> ka-re-'U They are brought down וְנָפָ֑לוּ <WH5307> ve-na-Fa-lu; and fallen וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we קַּ֝֗מְנוּ <WH6965> Kam-nu, but we are risen וַנִּתְעוֹדָֽד׃ <WH5749> van-nit-'o-Dad. and stand upright

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD הוֹשִׁ֑יעָה <WH3467> ho-Shi-'ah; Save הַ֝מֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, let the king יַעֲנֵ֥נוּ <WH6030> ya-'a-Ne-nu hear בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> ve-yom- us when קָרְאֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7121> ka-re-'E-nu. we call
